special_text:
[+1]: Create a 1/1 red Cleric creature token. If you control three or more Clerics, you may instead create Aspect of Faradia, a legendary 5/5 white Angel creature token with flying and vigilance.
[-1]: Exile target creature if you control an Angel. Otherwise, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated until your next turn.
[-7]: Creatures you control get +5/+5 and gain flying and vigilance until end of turn.
